explanation: [0-0] Three individuals are standing in a room. On the left, a woman wearing a black shirt and gray pants is holding a phone in front of her, facing right. In the center, a man wearing a black shirt is holding up a phone and looking at it. On the right, a woman wearing a loose gray T-shirt is pointing at the phone in the man's hand with her left hand, facing left. Behind them is a beige curtain, there are lights on both sides of the ceiling, and the floor is yellow.

[0-2] Next, the woman in black on the left walks to the right while smiling and talking. She then pulls up the waist of her pants with her left hand and bends down to take a picture. Afterward, she hands the phone to the man in black. The man in black opens his mouth in surprise, and the woman in the gray T-shirt on the right also looks surprised.

[0-2] Next, the woman in black on the left walks to the right while smiling and talking. She then pulls up the waist of her pants with her left hand and bends down to take a picture. Afterward, she hands the phone to the man in black. The man in black opens his mouth in surprise, and the woman in the gray T-shirt on the right also looks surprised.

[2-4] Subsequently, the man in black takes the phone in surprise, extends his left arm forward and shakes it. The woman in black smiles and faces forward, while the woman in gray raises her left fist and smiles towards the front.
